seo: VMware,SSRF,漏洞检测,服务器请求伪造,CVE-2021-21975
summary: 该插件用于检测 VMware vRealize Operations Manager 中的 CVE-2021-21975 SSRF 漏洞，通过发送特定请求验证是否存在服务端请求伪造问题。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect the CVE-2021-21975 SSRF vulnerability in VMware vRealize Operations Manager by sending specific requests to verify the existence of server request forgery issues.
